thread.title: Louboutina is the New York dog that loves to hug everyone
thread.title_full: Louboutina is the New York dog that loves to hug everyone

author: news.com.au
title: Louboutina is the New York dog that loves to hug everyone
text:
SHE‚ÄôS one of the most in demand celebrities in New York. But we‚Äôre not talking about Kim Kardashian.
Meet Louboutina, or Loubie, a five year-old golden retriever who‚Äôs become world-famous for her doggie hugs.
Named after the French fashion designer, Christian Louboutin, (made famous by the feet of Sarah Jessica Parker in Sex and the City), Loubie and his owner, Cesar Fernandez-Chavez, take to the streets of Chelsea offering free hugs to anyone that walks by.
most everything in the world is messed up right now, but at least there's a nice doggie in chelsea that goes around hugging ppl ‚ú®
A photo posted by chona üì∏‚ú® (@chonakasinger) on Jan 28, 2017 at 10:49am PST
According to Cesar, Loubie began holding hands with him at around three and a half years old, which then moved on to full blown hugs.
You‚Äôll often find Loubie at her favourite spot on the corner of 5th and 17th, standing upright, dishing out hugs to whoever is interested.
Repost @kobe_rg Got a hug from @louboutinanyc today.... so basically this was the best. day. ever. üòçüòçüòçüòç #dogsmakeeverythingbetter
A photo posted by Louboutina (Loubie) (@louboutinanyc) on Jan 14, 2017 at 8:06pm PST
‚ÄúShe likes people a lot and enjoy being in large crowds, and of course she loves being photographed and is not shy with the camera,‚Äù Cesar told the Metro. Loubie has 11.3K followers on Instagram and appears on thousands more public posts.
Loubie has now been trained as a therapy dog with the aim of doing volunteer work in hospitals and senior centres. Cesar himself works at Mount Sinai Beth Israel hospital in downtown Manhattan in the Program of Languages and Interpreter Services.
But for now, Loubie is stopping the notoriously fast paced New Yorkers in their tracks.
#tbt to one of the first times dad and I were spotted "holding hands" on Fifth Ave üê∂ . . . #aww #nyc #holdinghands #bw #photography #photooftheday #picoftheday #cute #sweet #adorable #hugdog #huggingdog #love #iloveyou #instagood #instaphoto #instamood #instacool #instalove #instadog #instadaily #like #follow #followme #instafollow #dog #dogsofinstagram #goldenretriever #louboutinanyc @louboutinanyc
A photo posted by Louboutina (Loubie) (@louboutinanyc) on Sep 1, 2016 at 2:00pm PDT
